title: Annihilate
lyrics:
Lazy summer
Rotten lumber
I'm a drunken auctioneer
Pillbox raincoat
A bloody halo
I've been better

Ain't it clear



Ooh, you can help me out

Ooh, but I don't know how

To annihilate

Annihilate



Posi-traction

Hired action

Turn and leave it if you must

Don't forget to write about it

Don't forget who you can trust



Ooh, you can break me out

Ooh, but I don't know how

To annihilate

Annihilate



And all our hometowns

Are havin' breakdowns

Will you come back off the lake?



Open-minded

Daily-grindin'

There's a man up on a hill

He doesn't like you

He doesn't love you

He doesn't know you

He never will



Ooh, you can burn it down

Ooh, but I don't know how

To annihilate

Annihilate
